The image used in the claim was a screen: showing two police officers from Nigeria's Rapid Response Squad apprehending a man in the street.
The image text on the claim highlighted: 3. The claim originated from a blog post by MMSPlus, a Nigerian website that focuses on business sectors like the maritime industry, energy, oil and gas, and finance.
AFP Fact Check cropped the text from the: which led them to online reports from April 2016. These reports were about the enforcement of the use of pedestrian bridges in Lagos, Nigeria, and the image was part of a photo essay by Legit, a Nigerian news site.
